text:
Hello,

I have an API call that collects details about a specified contact, one property is "CurrentlyInWorkflow", now this comes back as a boolean, if true what other API calls could I do to find out which workflow they are actually in?

Many Thanks
I think this is what youâ€™re looking for <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/current_enrollments>
Well that was quick, thank you very much, reading the link now

Is there a way to add a property to an existing custom object through <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects|the schema>? I need to add a property with `hasUniqueValue` for dynamic page creation, but I'd like to add to an existing object rather than start from scratch. Thanks!

Hey all!
I'm running into an issue when creating an instance of a custom object the API is returning a list of pre-existing instances rather than creating a new instance.

Endpoint:
<http://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/objectType?hapikey=XXXXXXXXXXXXXX|api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/objectType?hapikey=XXXXXXXXXXXXXX>

Body:
`{`
        `"type": "Test",`
        `"value": "a value"`
    `}`

Response:
`{`
    `"results": [`
        `{`
            `"id": "252344695",`
            `"properties": {`
